channel.title: Security on ToastIT
channel.description: Recent content in Security on ToastIT

item.title: The War on Passwords
item.description: The NIST guidelines struck a chord with me. It seemed to be something that our users would embrace while addressing potential issues within any given workplace

item.title: A Very Octocat U2F Key
item.description: GitHub now supports FIDO Universal 2nd Factor (U2F) as an option for two-factor authentication alongside their existing support for Google/Microsoft Authenticator Apps.
